tool_description: Bon happetee offers the unique advantage of having a deep database that is built with data mining/analytics in mind; specifically, it is built for smart computations and building algorithms and meal recommendation engine. The data has been built over the last 8 years using real insights from 100K users and 4 Million meal logs resulting in a best in class coverage, depth and usability.
name: BonHappetee Food & Nutrition API
title: BonHappetee Food & Nutrition API

api_list.name: multiSearch
ingredients
api_list.description:
For foods that are made up of multiple food items. This endpoint shows the detailed breakdown of ingredients and their specific proportions.  
  
**Not Available on lite plan**

api_list.name: searchFood
foodBasic
api_list.description:
The get Food Basic endpoint is a concise version of the get Food endpoint and contains.

- Basic food information  
- Nutrition

**Available on all plans**

api_list.name: food
api_list.description:
The get Food end point is the most comprehensive endpoint to receive all data about a given product.  
The endpoint includes  
- Basic food information  
- Nutrition  
- Preparation Details  
- Commonly paired foods  
- Food timing  
- Disorder based food consumption advice  
- Food Tags

**Not available on Lite plan**
